clues.text: This North Carolina capital was named in honor of a noted explorer in 1792
This word suitably introduces us to the fictional Mrs. Maisel & the very real boxing legend Marvin Hagler
Figuratively or literally, negotiations to reach an agreement (& often thwart a strike) are held here
Tom Petty:"It's Good To Be ____"
Playing Malorie in "Bird Box", this actress puts blindfolds on 2 kids, warning them not to take them off
A measurement of distance, not time, it's equal to about 6 trillion miles, you know, give or take
Named for Mahatma, Gandhinagar is home to 300,000 & the capital of Gujarat State in this country
A spreadsheet program that launched in 1985, or a verb meaning "to surpass"
In a spin-off of "Red Table Talk",thissinger,daughter Emily & niece Lilitackle tough issues within the Latino community
A 1996 Jay-Z single:"Dead ____"
One myth says the seer Tiresias was blinded by this Greek goddess of wisdom after seeing her nude
The troposphere is sandwiched between the earth & this next layer of the atmosphere
It didn't work out for this king with the American Revolution, but they named a town & nearby peak for him in South Africa
The Latin for "price" gives us this word that is perfectly fine in front of "gems" & "metals"
One legend says this piece of furniture was a wedding gift to King Arthur when he married Guinevere
Stevie Wonder:"Sir ____"
Michonne dealt with The Governor in a stabby way on this show; he'd later sport an eyepatch
Let's change the subject & talk about this class of rocks including gneiss & soapstone that gets changed atom by atom over time
In 1954 a New Jersey township voted to reject "Nixon" & renamed itself after this inventor
It's a good name for a 350-mile-long lake or the head of a convent
Those with high I.Q.s may know this 5-letter name of the organization whose name is the Latin for "table"
Spin Doctors:"Two ____"
One of this conniving group, Delilah alerts them that Samson is finally at their mercy; next comes some gouging
The size of a fist, this organ behind your left ribs fights invading germs in your blood by producing lymphocytes
Shahr means "city" & after 1979's Iranian revolution, a place was redubbed this last name "Shahr" to honor the new leader
Whether describing silver or the British pound, this 8-letter word really is great
Livermorium is one of the more recent additions to it
The Who:"The Acid ____"
In "King Lear" a bloodthirsty Regan demands that this man be hanged while Goneril screams, "Pluck out his eyes"
This Greek gave his name to the law that says a body in fluid is acted on by force proportional to how much fluid it displaces
